pages.text:
There are a total of 5 yeast types available to you.

Each yeast type can only go up to a certain alcohol percentage, and so each wine requires a specific breed of yeast in order to reach it's optimal alcohol content for rating.

pages.title: Yeasts
pages.text:
The yeast type which yields from your yeast pot is dependant on the temperature at which the yeast pot was allowed to ferment.

For example, mild environments yield Champagne yeast, capable of reaching up to 15% alcohol.
